text: G‑M‑A is a quick loop: Goals, Methods, Actions.
Goals: define the outcome in one clear sentence.
Methods: list ways to reach the goal—constraints and resources.
Pick the simplest method that fits your context.
Actions: translate method into the next 1–3 concrete steps.
Time‑box each step and set a visible checkpoint.
Run the loop again after your checkpoint to recalibrate.
Keep the loop small to maintain momentum and clarity.
